name: Cases not provided for in chapter Cross References Uniform management of institutional funds act, see chapter 517D. Rules of Court See Hawaii Probate Rules. Case Notes Bank's liability to principal for checks drawn by fiduciary, discussed.  856 F.2d 78.
text: Cases not provided for in chapter.  In any case not provided for in this chapter the rules of law and equity, including the law merchant and those rules of law and equity relating to trusts, agency, negotiable instruments, and banking, shall continue to apply. [L 1945, c 197, §12; RL 1955, §189-11; HRS ]
